s: Summary: AWS‑NineData‑VeloDB technical salon on enterprise blockchain, AI and data‑layer integration.
Topics: Cloud scalability, NoSQL, Apache Doris, AI‑enhanced trading, DevOps pipelines for digital assets.
Speakers: AWS solution architects, NineData CEO, VeloDB CTO.
r: Acquire cloud architecture patterns for institutional digital‑asset trading.
Explore AI‑driven analytics to optimize on‑chain data processing.
Network with leading cloud and database providers to future‑proof infrastructure.
